skip_reason: Perfect score (5/5) - this critique type skips perfect scores

source_caption_data.pre_caption:
This is a time-lapse video showing a dramatic thunderstorm. The movement of the clouds and the light trails from cars on the highway indicate the passage of time.

The scene captures a powerful storm over a vast, open landscape at dusk. Two parallel highways stretch towards the horizon, which is illuminated by a warm, orange glow. Above, the sky is dominated by a massive, turbulent formation of dark purple and blue storm clouds, with sheets of rain visible in the distance. Brilliant flashes of lightning periodically illuminate the clouds from within, casting a dramatic pink and purple light across the sky.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption:
This is a time-lapse video showing a dramatic thunderstorm. The movement of the clouds and the light trails from cars on the highway indicate the passage of time.

The scene captures a powerful storm over a vast, open landscape at dusk. Two parallel highways stretch towards the horizon, which is illuminated by a warm, orange glow. Above, the sky is dominated by a massive, turbulent formation of dark purple and blue storm clouds, with sheets of rain visible in the distance. Brilliant flashes of lightning periodically illuminate the clouds from within, casting a dramatic pink and purple light across the sky.
